content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. Based on our discussions, I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim. Is this a price that you are willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to consider this price, but I would like to negotiate. Can we agree on a lower price?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Of course, Mr. Li. I am open to negotiating the rental price. Based on my calculations, I believe that a rental price of 650 Euros per month would be more reasonable, taking into account the size of the apartment and current market rates in Mannheim. Is this a price that you are willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month. Thank you for your flexibility, Mister Heine. I will sign the contract as soon as possible.

Is there anything else I need to know before signing the contract?

Thank you.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Li. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. Before signing the contract, I would like to remind you that the rental price is subject to change based on market conditions and any changes in the apartment's condition. Additionally, I will require a security deposit of one month's rent in advance. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or ask about before signing the contract?
name: Heinrich Heine
